snippet: When an investment banker came back from the United States, she needed to remake her wardrobe. Now, she manages brand strategy for a leading Indian fashion house.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Poornima Vardhan, New York investment banker who returned to her native India as its economy began to boom, seeing a business opportunity in countrys retail clothing industry.
lead_paragraph: When an investment banker came back from the United States, she needed to remake her wardrobe. Now, she manages brand strategy for a leading Indian fashion house.

headline.seo: After Stint in New York, Banker Turns to Fashion in India
headline.main: After Life in New York, Banker Returns to India for Turn at Fashion
